title: Clothing and fashion: a history
brief_description: The evolution of fashions in clothing, from Egyptian times until today, is perceived in amusing animation. The choice to cover the body with unnatural materials has been made largely for social status, conformity and vanity. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
